description:
***NEW 2016 COURSE***

This course is designed to guide you through After Effects and show you the techniques required to create create awesome titles, clean animations, and 3D effects.

This course will start you at the very beginning, covering the basic tools and how they are used, to moving and animating objects around in 3D space.

My goal is to teach you the basics of how to operate After Effects in order to be able to enhance your personal videos with lower thirds, creative titles, or visual effects.

If you are ready to start creating some awesome visual effects... go ahead and click that enroll button!!
title: The After Effects Roadmap: For Beginners
